/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc    -Xcompiler -Wall                        -gencode=arch=compute_70,code=\"sm_70,compute_70\"                       -gencode=arch=compute_75,code=\"sm_75,compute_75\"                       -gencode=arch=compute_80,code=\"sm_80,compute_80\"                       -gencode=arch=compute_86,code=\"sm_86,compute_86\"                          --expt-extended-lambda --expt-relaxed-constexpr --std=c++11 -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/cal_paddingoffset.dir/cal_paddingoffset.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/cal_paddingoffset.dir/cmake_device_link.o
